Text: Decent sound & picture for a CAM. I feel that the picture is zoomed in too much though. Very watchable though.

The cam is hardly watchable!!  The screenshots they took, was the best of the movie.

Constant auto-focus - Overcrop of the movie screen - Major Darkness in some scenes -  Audio is OK, but has a bad hollow tin sound.

Wait for a better copy!!
